inventory=[{"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 12}, {"type": "purpur_stairs", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 6, "index": 27}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 63, "index": 32}, {"type": "spruce_trapdoor", "quantity": 60, "index": 34}]
thought: I need to craft a sandstone_wall, which requires 6 sandstone. I have 6 sandstone at slot 27, so I will move 1 sandstone to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1
